films.title: In from the Side
films.description: Fun film about a gay rugby team, but which featured absolutely no homophobia. It gets a high score from me because the main dude is so hot

films.title: Lonesome
films.description: A bit over the top gay film set in Australia. This was my second ever Kino-cumshot

films.title: The Banshees of Inisherin
films.description: Deeply upsetting film about depression in rural Ireland. Very beautiful

films.title: The Menu
films.description: Didn't understand the point of this film. Why did she order a burger and why was it such a big deal

films.title: The Blue Caftan
films.description: Lovely film set in Morocco about embroidery. Just lovely. Quite long

films.title: Futur Drei
films.description: Delightful film about second generation Iranian kids in Germany. Eye opening

films.title: Past Lives
films.description: Great opening scene. Loved humanising the American ‘villain’ character. Memorable film

films.title: Dipped in Black
films.description: Kinda boring depiction of transness in native American communities

films.title: Orlando
films.description: So boring, a theatre type film about Virginia Woolf and trans people

films.title: Tár
films.description: Great music, compelling story. Weird and uncomfortable world of conducting orchestras. The film is way too long

films.title: Lucky Strike
films.description: Korean thriller, it was good but I was sleepy on a plane watching it. Not very memorable

films.title: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent
films.description: So cringe but I have to admit that I laughed a lot. It's a film about Nick Cage.

films.title: The Whale
films.description: Devastating film. Ugly sobbing in the aeroplane. Watching him shovel in the food in such a self destructive way as a response to his self hatred is so painful

films.title: Roter Himmel
films.description: Mongay film where the main dude is so unlikeable and so rude to the other characters that it affects the enjoyment of the film

films.title: The Super Mario Movie
films.description: Loved it. As a Nintendo fan this was a must watch. Why the fuck did they have licensed music in it

films.title: El Houb
films.description: Devastating esposé on homophobic Arabic culture in Morocco. A strong willed man is determined to make his family understand that gay is fine

films.title: The Swimmer
films.description: What's it like being gay in an Israeli swimming team? Not that inspiring

films.title: Große Freiheit
films.description: This film totally stayed with me, even though the Austrian characters were hard to understand without subtitles. At the end when he goes cruising is very hard hitting

films.title: Bis ans Ende der Nacht
films.description: Cool film about a trans woman and an interesting plot. Also quite forgettable

films.title: Mon Crime
films.description: Fantastic lesbian nonsense! Delicious french film about women being successful

films.title: Asteroid City
films.description: Silly film leaning heavily into the vibes but was actually kinda boring to watch

films.title: Firebird
films.description: What's it like to be gay in the Russian military, except they don't even speak Russian!

films.title: Concerned Citizen
films.description: A film about gay men gentrifying a poor neighbourhood in Israel which hit me hard because I feel strongly about this topic

films.title: Heartbeats
films.description: Film about a gay guy and a girl falling in love with the same hot guy. Some hilarious moments, highly enjoyable

films.title: Drifter
films.description: This is about a boring countryside gay man becoming a Berlin queer. I really saw myself in him

films.title: Passages
films.description: Like it's good, but I didn't enjoy it. Something about films with unlikeable main characters

films.title: Rotting in the Sun
films.description: Film about gay expats in Mexico, definitely saw myself in it. It was hilarious and wild. Loses tension a bit in the second half

films.title: Fallen Leaves
films.description: Beautiful film about poverty in Finland. Has a heavy 60s/70s vibe but is in the present day

films.title: Burning Days
films.description: Small town Turkey with a pretty interesting plot. I enjoyed it. Gay themes

films.title: The Beast in the Jungle
films.description: Cool view into a Paris nightclub over the years but didn't take away much else from this film

films.title: Where Butterflies Don't Fly
films.description: Gay schoolteacher and pupil trapped in a cave together. Really well handled and suspenseful, enjoyable film

films.title: Golden Delicious
films.description: Cheesy American gay film nonsense

films.title: Arrête Avec tes Mensonges
films.description: Boring film about an old french famous person who used to love a man

films.title: Wir Werden Unsterblich Sein
films.description: Hilariously bad film from Saarland. A gay thriller with terrible acting and editing

films.title: Horseplay
films.description: Deeply harrowing film about lads on holiday. Explains the deep rooted homophobia in Argentina

films.title: In Bed
films.description: Really good film set almost entirely in a bedroom during a dramatic time about a hot gay guy who spirals downwards
